lead_paragraph: The first feature film from the director Daniel Peddle follows a mysterious young man whose world intersects with four teenagers hanging out at this deserted location.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Sunset Edge,’ Where Mysteries Lurk at an Abandoned Trailer Park
headline.main: Review: ‘Sunset Edge,’ Where Mysteries Lurk at an Abandoned Trailer Park

snippet: The first feature film from the director Daniel Peddle follows a mysterious young man whose world intersects with four teenagers hanging out at this deserted location.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews movie Sunset Edge, directed by Daniel Peddle.
